title: NewPipe 0.22.0 brings YouTube-like rewind and fast-forward behavior
content:
NewPipe is an open-source YouTube client that lets you play YouTube videos on your smartphone without the YouTube app. It can be helpful for users who either don’t like the YouTube app on Android or don’t have Google Play Sevices installed, which is a requirement for the YouTube app. In regions where Google services aren’t

The post NewPipe 0.22.0 brings YouTube-like rewind and fast-forward behavior appeared first on xda-developers.
description: NewPipe 0.22.0 is here, and it brings a few new features including YouTube-like rewind and fast-forward behavior. Check it out here!
